item.title: 362: Stan Lee & Men of Marvel
item.itunes:author: Kevin Smith, Scott Mosier
item.itunes:summary:
In which our hero moderates a panel at NYCC 2016 with Stan Lee, Chris Claremont & Walt Simonson.
No one can deny that Stan Lee’s impact on comics is immeasurable! He has created characters and worlds that will forever be a part of comics and pop culture. Join Stan Lee along with Chris Claremont (Uncanny X-Men) and Walt Simonson (Thor) as they discuss their most memorable moments and honor “The Man” behind the legend. Excelsior!
item.itunes:subtitle: In which our hero moderates a panel at NYCC 2016 …
item.description: In which our hero moderates a panel at NYCC 2016 with Stan Lee, Chris Claremont & Walt Simonson. No one can deny that Stan Lee’s impact on comics is immeasurable! He has created characters and worlds that will forever be a part of comics and pop culture. Join Stan Lee along with Chris Claremont (Uncanny X-Men) and Walt Simonson (Thor) as they discuss their most memorable moments and honor “The Man” behind the legend. Excelsior!
item.author: info@smodcast.com (Kevin Smith & Scott Mosier)
